title: Which will decrease the unemployment rate

content.question: Which of the following will most likely decrease the unemployment rate?

choices.label: Workers become discouraged and drop out of the labor force.
Workers lose jobs when their skills become obsolete.
Workers switch from full-time to part-time jobs.
Workers are not allowed to work from home.
Workers continue to work after reaching the retirement age.

content.answer: Workers become discouraged and drop out of the labor force.

unit.text: 2: Economic Indicators and the Business Cycle

skill.text: Skill 2.A: Using economic concepts, principles, or models, explain how a specific economic outcome occurs, or what action should be taken in order to achieve a specific economic outcome.
